item.description: American Ballroom & Latin Dance Studio hosts Friday Dance Socials on the 2nd, 3rd & 4th Friday of the month where many singles & couples meetup to dance. The venue is located at Maironis Park in Shrewsbury, MA. An all-levels class starts at 7:15pm followed by a social dance from 8-11pm. Dance hosts & social mixers gets everyone up and dancing to Latin, Ballroom & Contemporary music. The lounge area hosts a cash bar, coffee service and lite refreshments. Admission is $15pp which includes the lesson, dance & refreshments. Directions at the dance can be found at the ABL Dance website, www.AmericanBallroomLatin.com. Hope to see you on the dance floor!

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: Central MA Ballroom & Latin Dance Meetup
